thread.title: Harry Cauley
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Harry Cauley

author: Harry Cauley
title: Harry Cauley
text:
The service was great. The part I ordered fit perfectly. Just two things Idid not like.
1- I ordered a kerosene lamp chimney it fir great but there are blemishes in the top of the glass.
2- The chimney was made in China. I was hoping it had been made in America. The one that broke was American made.
Other than that it will work as designed and for the purpose it was made.
